property.agent_ref: Jan Mitchell Properties, Covering North East

details.description: Ricklees Farm is a stone-built farmhouse and cottage set on a 2.15-acre plot with uninterrupted southerly views across the surrounding countryside. The property blends traditional country house ambiance with high-quality contemporary finishes. The main house features a light-filled drawing room with high ceilings, French doors to the patio, herringbone flooring, and a grand fireplace with a woodburning stove. The adjoining sitting room includes an inglenook fireplace and bi-fold doors to the garden. The kitchen/dining room is equipped with bespoke cabinetry, a central island, and a range cooker complemented by integrated appliances. Bi-fold doors open to the patio, creating a perfect space for entertaining. The ground floor also includes a fully tiled shower room and access to a luxurious sauna. Upstairs, three spacious bedrooms provide a tranquil retreat. The principal bedroom features dual aspect windows and ample fitted storage. A boutique-style bathroom includes a freestanding clawfoot bath, walk-in rainfall shower, twin wash hand basins, and WC.
features: Seldom Available, Once in a Lifetime Opportunity

property.agent_ref: Pattinson Estate Agents, Whickham

details.description: This magnificent five-bedroom detached house is located in the charming village of Rowlands Gill, conveniently situated near local amenities and offering excellent transport links for easy commuting. The property boasts an eco-friendly design, featuring a gas boiler, state-of-the-art air source heat pump system, solar PV (electric), and solar thermal (water) systems to enhance energy efficiency. A spacious driveway leads to a double garage, and delightful gardens surround the house on all four sides, providing serene areas for relaxation and stunning views of the picturesque countryside. Upon entering, a generous hallway leads to a conveniently located shower room and a bedroom, ideal for accommodating guests. The entrance also features a double staircase guiding you to the first floor. The spacious, bright, and airy lounge is bathed in natural light, offering fantastic views of the front garden and a charming balcony perfect for enjoying the evening sunshine. A few steps down from the lounge, you'll find an inviting dining area, elegantly designed for hosting special occasions and gatherings. The well-appointed kitchen overlooks the rear garden, making it perfect for family meals and entertaining. It connects seamlessly to a practical utility room and a cloakroom with a WC. Additionally, there's a cozy snug featuring a multi-fuel burner and doors that lead to the garden.
features: Located in the charming village of Rowlands Gill
Spacious driveway leading to a double garage
Balcony perfect for enjoying the evening sunshine

property.agent_ref: Jan Mitchell Properties, Covering North East

details.description: This substantial five-bedroom detached bungalow, circa 2,500 sq. feet, is situated on a south-facing corner plot within the exclusive Hamsterley Mill Estate. The property has been meticulously updated, blending traditional and contemporary finishes. The entrance porch leads to a hallway with engineered oak flooring extending throughout much of the home. The east wing features a generous living room with French doors opening to the south-facing garden, a double bedroom, and a bathroom with a freestanding Burlington bath, shower cubicle, traditional toilet, and underfloor heating. The central area includes another double bedroom and a dining room with French doors to the garden, leading to an inner hallway connecting to the west wing. The breakfasting kitchen boasts porcelain-tiled flooring, cream cabinetry with granite countertops, an island unit, and a Range-style cooker with a six-ring gas hob. Additional amenities include a large gated driveway, garage, and a sunny southerly rear aspect.

property.agent_ref: Jan Mitchell Properties, Covering North East

details.description: Inglenook is a bespoke, double-fronted detached family home offering expansive accommodation over three floors. The property features a grand double-height glazed entrance hall with oak balustrade, leading to an open-plan kitchen/dining/living area with a substantial central island and integrated appliances. The living space is enhanced by 5-meter-wide bifold doors opening to a west-facing garden, ideal for entertaining. Additional ground-floor amenities include a formal reception room with a bay window and log burner, a family/games room, a utility room with side access, and a downstairs WC. The first floor comprises four well-proportioned bedrooms, with the master suite featuring an en-suite shower room, walk-in wardrobe, freestanding bath, and a dormer with a Juliet balcony. A five-piece family bathroom completes this level. The second floor offers a large bedroom or reception room illuminated by skylights. Externally, the property boasts a large driveway with EV charging port leading to an integral double garage, and a substantial west-facing garden with a studio equipped with power at the rear.
features: Large driveway with EV charging port

property.agent_ref: Jan Mitchell Properties, Covering North East

details.description: A bespoke, architecturally designed five-bedroom detached home located in a private setting with a south-facing garden and large driveway.

property.agent_ref: Sanderson Young, Gosforth

address.house_name_number: St. Patricks Parsonage including former Church Hall

details.description: St. Patricks Parsonage, circa 1890, is a period detached house located in a stunning woodland setting, with approximately 0.7 acres of gardens and woodland. The property features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a versatile former Church Hall with multi-functional use. The house has been refurbished and retains many original features, including wood floorboards and period fireplaces. The property offers fantastic views over the surrounding fields and countryside.
features: Set in approximately 0.7 acres of gardens and woodland
Former Church Hall with multi-functional use
Fantastic views over the surrounding fields and countryside
Bespoke picture windows in sitting and dining rooms
Stunning landscaped gardens and kitchen garden

property.agent_ref: Sarah Mains Residential, Whickham

details.description: A spacious six-bedroom bungalow with a large landscaped garden, offering modern amenities such as a kitchen with an Aga oven, a spacious lounge, and multiple bathrooms. It includes a substantial driveway, a summer house, and a decked patio.

property.agent_ref: New Home Agents

details.description: MODERN 5 BEDROOM DETACHED FAMILY HOME - IDEAL FOR GROWING FAMILIES. Large welcoming porch leading to hallway via glass door, living room, open plan kitchen/diner through to family room with french doors to the rear garden, utility room, study/office, downstairs WC. First floor: 5 bedrooms including 2 x en-suite bedrooms, one with bath and separate shower. Large private enclosed rear garden with countryside surroundings, double garage with electric doors, decorative outside smart lighting.
features: En-suite master bedroom with separate shower

property.agent_ref: Your Move Chris Stonock, Rowlands Gill

details.description: Built in the early 1900s, this spacious double-fronted period home should appeal to family buyers. It is situated within the Rowlands Gill conservation area and offers excellent local amenities. The property features two large double bedrooms, a dining room with bay window, kitchen/family room with granite worktops, and an en suite master bedroom. The garden includes two-tiered lawns, a summerhouse, and electric car charging points.

property.agent_ref: Living Local, Blaydon

details.description: This stunning, spacious detached property has been renovated to an exceptional standard, offering a modern style kitchen/dining room, utility room, lounge, and four spacious double bedrooms, including a master with an en-suite and dressing area. The property has the potential for a self-contained annex and boasts a detached double garage, parking, and a private rear garden with artificial lawn and a decked seating area.

property.agent_ref: Finest Properties

details.description: The Old Lodge is a delightful Grade II Listed period lodge with character and traditional features blended with stunning interior décor. It offers a cosy atmosphere with features such as a cast iron fireplace, vaulted ceilings, bespoke cabinetry, and a generous garden with outdoor entertaining spaces. Located in Hamsterley Mill, it offers scenic views and access to the parkland and woodland walks.

property.agent_ref: Jan Mitchell Properties, Covering North East

details.description: Inviting offers between £575,000 and £600,000 for this unique stone house, blending modern functionality and character features. Fully renovated, with a large rear extension, south-facing garden, and premium fixtures and fittings. Includes high-quality kitchen, two bathrooms, and an integral garage. Located in a desirable, secluded area surrounded by woodlands.
features: Gated access with secure intercom entry

property.agent_ref: Vistry North East (Bovis)

details.description: Exciting new home development Scholars' Meadows featuring The Yew, a family-friendly house with spacious living areas, bi-fold patio doors, an open-plan kitchen/dining area, utility room, study, and separate living room. The first floor has three bedrooms, with the master bedroom including an en-suite. The second floor includes two bedrooms sharing a shower room. Ideal for families with guests or older children.

property.agent_ref: J W Wood, Consett

details.description: A superb new development of 13, three & four bedroomed detached houses, situated on the outskirts of Rowlands Gill. The properties are built to a high specification with a 10-year structural warranty. Early reservations allow buyers to choose kitchen and bathroom fittings.

property.agent_ref: YOUR MOVE Chris Stonock, Rowlands Gill

details.description: Built in the 1890s, this large, extended period home provides spacious and versatile accommodation over three floors, ideal for families. The house retains many traditional features and is situated within the Rowlands Gill conservation area, with UPVC glazing and gas central heating. It includes spacious reception rooms, a fitted kitchen, and five bedrooms, with lovely views of the Derwent Valley.
features: Good access to Newcastle and the A1(M)

property.agent_ref: Jan Mitchell Properties, Covering North East

details.description: Jan Mitchell Properties are delighted to bring to the market this stunning stone built cottage, situated on the most idyllic of plots, surrounded by rolling countryside, that has been significantly improved by the current vendors located just off Thornley Lane in the picturesque village of Rowlands Gill. The accommodation is all on one floor and includes a spacious open-plan kitchen diner with valley views, a cosy lounge with a vaulted ceiling, and three generous bedrooms, with the master featuring a high specification en-suite. The external grounds offer wrap-around gardens, perfect for those with a passion for nature.

property.agent_ref: Vistry North East (Bovis)

details.description: The Briar is an elegant double-fronted home designed for modern living. The spacious open-plan kitchen and dining area is the heart of the home, with bi-fold doors leading to the garden, while the separate utility room offers external access. A stylish bay window enhances the sitting room, and a dedicated study provides the perfect work-from-home space. Upstairs, four well-proportioned bedrooms include a luxurious en suite to bedroom one.
features: Open plan kitchen and dining room with access to the garden
Separate sitting room with bay window
Versatile space for study or playroom

details.description: A four-bedroom detached home with lounge, dining area, fitted kitchen, utility room, four bedrooms, en-suite, and family bathroom. Features a west-facing garden, driveway parking, and a double garage. No onward chain.

Located in a semi-rural village with nearby amenities and popular countryside walks.
